segments.text: After I am accepted for unemployment benefits , what will happen next ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will receive a Notice of Unemployment Insurance Award letter .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The Award Letter will tell you how much you will receive weekly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there any other forms that I need to fill out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You will need to fill out a Continued Claim Form every two weeks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What information will I need to provide on that form ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They will need to know where you worked and how much money you made .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Are there any other questions on the form ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Basically , they want to know that you were available for work and not sick .
segments.speaker: S2
